title: Hyundai Sonata Named 2016 Green Car of the Year Finalist (Hyundai Motor Group)
text: ( Source : Hyundai Motor Group ) Green Car Journal named the Hyundai Sonata mid-size sedan, including the Sonata Eco, Sonata Hybrid and Sonata Plug-in Hybrid , a finalist for the 2016 Green Car of the Year award. Each year, five finalists are
